DOC.brief_summary: This open label study estimate effect maraviroc pharmacokinetics digoxin , probe p-glycoprotein .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of Maraviroc On The Pharmacokinetics Of Digoxin
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 21 55 year , inclusive . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 25.5 kg/m2 . Total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) precede first dose study medication . Subjects estimate creatinine clearance ( CLcr ) < 80 ml/min . Pregnant nursing female . Females childbearing potential unwilling unable use acceptable method contraception outline protocol least 14 day prior first dose study medication completion study .
